snippet.title: Seed of Heroes Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Seed of Heroes is a bullet heaven game where players take on the role of warriors seeking glorious battles and get into the halls of Valhalla. Journey through various realms, take on hordes of enemies, collect treasures, and defeat bosses that will try to stop you. Pass the trials and tribulations, and prepare for the Ragnarok.

Create a party of heroes where each of them has unique attacks and leadership abilities. Choose one that either best matches your situation or just to your liking! Remember, only the leader can be hit!

Grid-based: Bosses’ attacks, unique encounters, and special treasures function mostly on the grid stage and players will face specially crafted attack patterns where they can learn to dodge even in the chaos of a bullet heaven game.

Adjustable formation: Players can adjust their party’s formation to best fit the situation they find themselves in, as well as aim all their members’ attack to a single point to help them get out of a mess. 

Streamer Mode: Stream the game on Twitch and put your fate in the hands of your viewers! Streamer Mode allows viewers to vote for treasures as well as send in groups of enemies with increased rewards as well.
